    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kalorimetrija:  razvrščanje</string>
            <string language="en">Calorimetry: ranking task</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalorimetrie: Klassifizierungaufgabe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calorimetrie : le rang chargent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calorimetry: tarefa do ranking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calorimetria: operazione di posto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Calorimetry: ταξινόμηση της στοιχειώδους 
εργασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calorimetría: tarea de la graduación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Hitrost dosega toplotnega ravnovesja pri različnih predmetih v vodi.</string>
            <string language="en">Time it takes to archive heat balance in case of different objects in the water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplotno ravnovesje</string>
            <string language="en">heat balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">specifična toplota</string>
            <string language="en">specific heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit, die, sie zur Archivwärmebilanz falls von 
den unterschiedlichen Nachrichten im Wasser dauert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Temps où il prend à l'équilibre thermique 
d'archives en cas de différents objets dans l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo onde faz exame ao contrapeso de calor do 
arquivo caso que de objetos diferentes na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo che occorre all'equilibrio termico 
dell'archivio nel caso degli oggetti differenti nell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο χρόνος αυτό παίρνει στην ισορροπία θερμότητας 
αρχείων σε περίπτωση διαφορετικών αντικειμένων στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiempo que lleva el balance de calor del archivo 
en caso de que de diversos objetos en el agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmebilanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spezifische Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur spécifique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contrapeso de calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor específico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equilibrio termico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore specifico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισορροπία θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συγκεκριμένη θερμότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">balance de calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">calor específico</string>
          </keyword>
